channel.title: I can't see others?
channel.description:
Heya, I have some problems (again)....
Well, i changed the IP 127.0.0.1 in server.java into my no-ip (epicpkclient.no-ip.biz) but my friend cant see me and i cant see my friend...
So what do i do?
(Source: Torvapkz V1 [PI]

item.title: I can't see others?
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

spearo:

Make sure its in your gui.java /client.java / server.java it could be in any of those in your CLIENT folder. And make sure you portforwarded correctly, and then compile.

How you mean porforwarded correctly? (Don’t understand that…)

In the client.java file i changed this: server= “127.0.0.1”; into server= “epicpkclient.no-ip.biz”;
and also inthe client.java file this:if(myPrivilege >= 2 || server.equals(“127.0.0.1”) into if(myPrivilege >= 2 || server.equals(“epicpkclient.no-ip.biz”)

And in GUI.java file i changed this: return new URL(“http://127.0.0.1/cache”); into return new URL(“http://epicpkclient.no-ip.biz/cache”);

And some more things bot in CLIENT folder

Now i’m waiting for my friend… i hope it helped thanx anyways

Read full topic

item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

asshole_rule:

You changed it in the client, right?

When i change it in the client.java i get errors while running server…
